meanings.definition: Following the embryonic stage of development.
meanings.sent1: The postembryonal growth of the plant was remarkable.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the postembryonal changes in the organism.
meanings.sent3: The postembryonal transformation of the caterpillar into a butterfly was quite a sight!
meanings.sent4: Her postembryonal journey from student to professional was inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The postembryonal phase of the project marked a new beginning.

meanings.definition: Relating to the period after embryonic development.
meanings.sent1: The postembryonal features of the animal were fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent2: Researchers focused on the postembryonal characteristics of the species.
meanings.sent3: The postembryonal changes in the weather took everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent4: His postembryonal growth in the company was impressive.
meanings.sent5: The postembryonal period marked a time of significant progress.
